scripts.generate-reminders: node -e "import('./src/services/ReminderSchedulerService.js').then(m => new m.ReminderSchedulerService()).then(s => s.generateReminderSchedules()).then(r => console.log('Generated:', r)).catch(e => console.error(e))"
scripts.test-reminders: node -e "import('./src/services/ReminderSchedulerService.js').then(m => new m.ReminderSchedulerService()).then(s => s.getTodaysReminders()).then(r => console.log('Today\'s reminders:', r.length)).catch(e => console.error(e))"
